snippet: Less than two hours after President Obama left Afghanistan on Wednesday, a large bomb exploded at the gates of the Green Village, a compound used by foreigners.
abstract: Powerful explosions shake Kabul less than two hours after President Obama leaves Afghanistan; suicide attackers strike a private residential compound used by hundreds of foreigners in the east of the city, breaching the outer perimeter and leaving at least eight dead and about 17 wounded.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and SANGAR RAHIMI
byline.contributor: Rod Nordland and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Less than two hours after President Obama left Afghanistan on Wednesday, a large bomb exploded at the gates of the Green Village, a compound used by foreigners.

headline.seo: Suicide Attackers Kill at Least 8 in Kabul
headline.main: Hours After Obama’s Visit, Suicide Attackers Kill at Least 8 in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Hours After Obama’s Visit, Suicide Attackers Kill at Least 8 in Afghanistan
